short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that displays what is currently playing on KEXP.org

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A browser extension that displays the track, artist and album from the currently playing track on KEXP 90.3 FM in Seattle. Just click on the icon and a window appears to display the album artwork (if available) song, artist and album.

KEXP is a listener-powered radio station out of Seattle Washington and streaming all over the world. Learn more about KEXP and itâ€™s mission at KEXP.org
